external_homepage: Just When You Thought We Were All Alone
name: Purpuras
short_description: The Purpura Species was first founded when scientist sent a probe to Gleise 581g in 2010. This discovery not only changed our perception on life beyond our system but gave us an insight to just how different we and the Purpuras are. We learned about their culture and methods they use to maintain a peaceful (Yup complete planetary peace) society. Not to mention the unusual way they reproduce. Whether you look towards them for an insight in their biological features, reproductive habits, or political cultures you will never the less be surprised at how these beings exist.
